9. Contact

For more information about career planning and the support available to you as a university student, please contact your university’s careers service and they will be able to advise you on the services and resources they have available for you.

About this resource

This e-learning resource has been created by the University of Warwick, UK, through funding from the UK Government FCO Prosperity Fund and the British Council.

Further courses

The University of Warwick has also created an Innovation Skills and Entrepreneurship e-learning resource for Chinese students studying in the UK – www.innovate2getahead.co.uk

Feedback

Use your university website and check the information regularly to avoid missing some good opportunities.
Undergraduate student

Created by the University of Warwick. Funded by the FCO Prosperity Fund.
